attributes.additional_details:
My issue is that I Emmanuel Sowunmi and my partner Matthew Franc are both on a Citizenship Project and we would like it if you all can help and support us in our aim to prevent and reduce racism, especially in football. After the incident between Anton Ferdinand and John Terry, Patrice Evra and Luis Suarez. We feel that the FA should be more stricter with incidents about racism.
Please support our campaign and sign our petition.
